Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Madison/Wabash
ShortDescription: Eastbound #60 Blue Island/26th buses are rerouted via Washington, Clark, Monroe, Dearborn and Madison (Layover), due to street blockage near Madison/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, Clark, Monroe, Dearborn and Madison (Layover), due to street blockage near Madison/Wabash.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
